display_long_description:
Saber City is a 2-player co-located dueling game for Meta Quest. 2 players can link their headsets in the same physical space and battle with melee and ranged weapons. Saber City features mixed reality gameplay, so you and a friend can see each other in the real world ,via the Oculus Quest’s cameras, and battle in AR.

***NOTE:  Saber City is a multiplayer game and requires 2 Meta Quest headsets to play.

IMPORTANT: Please maintain at least 3 feet distance between yourself and the other player. Be aware of your surroundings. Do not run with the headset on.

You can choose from 4 different character battle kits with unique weapons to wield in mixed reality. The current version of Saber City includes support for Meta Quest Pro and Quest 3.

Battle Kits:

COWBORG - Cyber cowboy with cattle prod and shotgun

SKYLORD - Hammer wielding warrior from beyond

SKULL CZAR - Possessing dark energy sword and magic bow

SABER SENTINAL - AR soldier with saber and pistol

For questions and feedback please join the Saber City Discord server: https://discord.gg/EhuQSbNeYV

or contact via email: contact@yarwad.com
